name: Private Hands
description:
Talk to various clients and help them "unlock" their problems.

This game is currently a demo in development (v6). Only the first mission is implemented. There may be some bugs or unfinished content within the game.

The game takes around 7 minutes to complete currently.

Controls

Navigation - Mouse, Left Click, Right Click

Dialogue - Spacebar

Restart - R

Known Bugs/Issues

- The movement in the game is finnicky and be hard to control.

- If you restart during the game, some variables are saved, meaning some of the dialogue might be skipped. (You have to restart your browser to see all the dialogue)

- If you've already completed the game or lost the game, you can still interact with Holly

- Some props are small and hard to see. Sorry!
